app/app.config.ts:
import { ApplicationConfig } from '@angular/core';

 export const appConfig: ApplicationConfig = { providers: [], };
app.component.html:
This sample includes a wide range of arc gauges with varying appearances based on the built-in features and customization options.

In this example, you can see how to render an arc gauge in various styles. You can use axes, ranges, pointers and annotations oriented properties to customize the appearance of the arc gauge, in order to achieve the desired outcome.

More information on the pointers can be found in this documentation section.
